scripts.start:tsclint: yarn clean:dist && concurrently --kill-others --names lint,tsc,nodemon --prefix-colors green,blue,yellow "yarn lint" "tsc --preserveWatchOutput --watch" "sleep 8 && nodemon -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/index.js"
scripts.start:prod: yarn build:prod && NODE_PATH=dist node -r tsconfig-paths/register dist/index.js
